instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Show me all patient IDs and names in the system.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?patientID ?patientName
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientID ?patientID .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName ?patientName .
}

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Retrieve all patients older than 65 years.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?patientID ?patientName ?patientAge
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientAge ?patientAge .
  ?patient dcm:PatientID ?patientID .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName ?patientName .
  FILTER(xsd:integer(REPLACE(?patientAge, "Y", "")) > 65)
}

question: List all studies conducted on January 15, 2023.

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Show me the most recent study for each patient.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?patientName ?studyInstanceUID ?studyDate
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName ?patientName .
  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study dcm:StudyInstanceUID ?studyInstanceUID .
  ?study dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate .
  FILTER NOT EXISTS {
    ?study2 rdf:type dcm:Study .
    ?study2 dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
    ?study2 dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate2 .
    FILTER(?studyDate2 > ?studyDate)
  }
}

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Show me studies conducted on weekends.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?studyInstanceUID ?studyDate ?studyDescription
WHERE {
  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate .
  ?study dcm:StudyInstanceUID ?studyInstanceUID .
  OPTIONAL { ?study dcm:StudyDescription ?studyDescription . }
  BIND(xsd:integer(STRAFTER(STR(xsd:date(?studyDate)), "---")) AS ?dayOfWeek)
  FILTER(?dayOfWeek = 6 || ?dayOfWeek = 0)
}

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Retrieve studies that took more than 2 hours to complete.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?studyInstanceUID ?studyDescription ?studyTime ?studyEndTime
WHERE {
  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:StudyTime ?studyTime .
  ?study dcm:StudyEndTime ?studyEndTime .
  ?study dcm:StudyInstanceUID ?studyInstanceUID .
  OPTIONAL { ?study dcm:StudyDescription ?studyDescription . }
  BIND(xsd:integer(SUBSTR(?studyEndTime, 1, 2)) - xsd:integer(SUBSTR(?studyTime, 1, 2)) AS ?hourDiff)
  BIND(xsd:integer(SUBSTR(?studyEndTime, 3, 2)) - xsd:integer(SUBSTR(?studyTime, 3, 2)) AS ?minuteDiff)
  BIND(xsd:integer(SUBSTR(?studyEndTime, 5, 2)) - xsd:integer(SUBSTR(?studyTime, 5, 2)) AS ?secondDiff)
  BIND(?hourDiff * 3600 + ?minuteDiff * 60 + ?secondDiff AS ?totalSecondsDiff)
  FILTER(?totalSecondsDiff > 7200)
}

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find series with more than 100 images.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?seriesInstanceUID ?seriesDescription (COUNT(?image) AS ?imageCount)
WHERE {
  ?series rdf:type dcm:Series .
  ?series dcm:SeriesInstanceUID ?seriesInstanceUID .
  ?series dcm:containsImage ?image .
  OPTIONAL { ?series dcm:SeriesDescription ?seriesDescription . }
}
GROUP BY ?seriesInstanceUID ?seriesDescription
HAVING (COUNT(?image) > 100)

question: Show me all patients who had MRI studies in the last month.

}

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Retrieve all series and their image counts for studies performed on weekends.

PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?studyInstanceUID ?studyDate ?seriesInstanceUID (COUNT(?image) AS ?imageCount)
WHERE {
  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate .
  ?study dcm:StudyInstanceUID ?studyInstanceUID .
  ?series rdf:type dcm:Series .
  ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study .
  ?series dcm:SeriesInstanceUID ?seriesInstanceUID .

}
GROUP BY ?studyInstanceUID ?studyDate ?seriesInstanceUID

question: Show me the average number of images per series for each study.

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?studyInstanceUID (AVG(?imageCount) AS ?avgImagesPerSeries)
WHERE {
  SELECT ?studyInstanceUID ?series (COUNT(?image) AS ?imageCount)
  WHERE {
    ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
    ?study dcm:StudyInstanceUID ?studyInstanceUID .
    ?series rdf:type dcm:Series .
    ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study .
    ?series dcm:containsImage ?image .
  }
  GROUP BY ?studyInstanceUID ?series
}
GROUP BY ?studyInstanceUID

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Count the number of patients in each age decade (0-9, 10-19, etc.).

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?ageDecade (COUNT(?patient) AS ?patientCount)
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientAge ?patientAge .
  BIND(xsd:integer(REPLACE(?patientAge, "Y", "")) AS ?age)
  BIND(FLOOR(?age / 10) * 10 AS ?ageDecade)
}
GROUP BY ?ageDecade

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: List all patients who had their first study before 2020.

PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>

WHERE {

  ?patient dcm:PatientName ?patientName .
  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study dcm:StudyDate ?firstStudyDate .
  FILTER NOT EXISTS {
    ?earlierStudy rdf:type dcm:Study .
    ?earlierStudy dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
    ?earlierStudy dcm:StudyDate ?earlierDate .
    FILTER(?earlierDate < ?firstStudyDate)
  }
  FILTER(YEAR(xsd:date(?firstStudyDate)) < 2020)
}

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Retrieve studies performed on holidays in 2022.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate .
  ?study dcm:StudyInstanceUID ?studyInstanceUID .
  OPTIONAL { ?study dcm:StudyDescription ?studyDescription . }
  FILTER(
    (xsd:date(?studyDate) = xsd:date("2022-01-01")) || # New Year's Day
    (xsd:date(?studyDate) = xsd:date("2022-12-25")) || # Christmas
    (xsd:date(?studyDate) = xsd:date("2022-07-04")) || # Independence Day (US)
    (xsd:date(?studyDate) = xsd:date("2022-11-24")) || # Thanksgiving (US)
    (xsd:date(?studyDate) = xsd:date("2022-05-30")) || # Memorial Day (US)
    (xsd:date(?studyDate) = xsd:date("2022-09-05"))    # Labor Day (US)
  )
}

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find patients who had multiple studies within the same week.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?patientID ?patientName
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientID ?patientID .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName ?patientName .
  ?study1 rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study1 dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study1 dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate1 .
  ?study2 rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study2 dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study2 dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate2 .
  FILTER(?study1 != ?study2)
  BIND(WEEK(xsd:date(?studyDate1)) AS ?week1)
  BIND(YEAR(xsd:date(?studyDate1)) AS ?year1)
  BIND(WEEK(xsd:date(?studyDate2)) AS ?week2)
  BIND(YEAR(xsd:date(?studyDate2)) AS ?year2)
  FILTER(?week1 = ?week2 && ?year1 = ?year2)
}

question: Show me all series acquired within 24 hours of the study date.

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Show me series acquired in the last day of each month in 2023.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?seriesInstanceUID ?seriesDate ?seriesDescription
WHERE {
  ?series rdf:type dcm:Series .
  ?series dcm:SeriesDate ?seriesDate .
  ?series dcm:SeriesInstanceUID ?seriesInstanceUID .
  OPTIONAL { ?series dcm:SeriesDescription ?seriesDescription . }
  FILTER(YEAR(xsd:date(?seriesDate)) = 2023)
  BIND(MONTH(xsd:date(?seriesDate)) AS ?month)
  BIND(DAY(xsd:date(?seriesDate)) AS ?day)
  FILTER(
    (?month = 1 && ?day = 31) ||
    (?month = 2 && ?day = 28) ||
    (?month = 3 && ?day = 31) ||
    (?month = 4 && ?day = 30) ||
    (?month = 5 && ?day = 31) ||
    (?month = 6 && ?day = 30) ||
    (?month = 7 && ?day = 31) ||
    (?month = 8 && ?day = 31) ||
    (?month = 9 && ?day = 30) ||
    (?month = 10 && ?day = 31) ||
    (?month = 11 && ?day = 30) ||
    (?month = 12 && ?day = 31)
  )
}
ORDER BY ?seriesDate

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find patients who had studies in consecutive months.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?patientID ?patientName
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientID ?patientID .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName ?patientName .
  ?study1 rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study1 dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study1 dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate1 .
  ?study2 rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study2 dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study2 dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate2 .
  FILTER(?study1 != ?study2)
  BIND(YEAR(xsd:date(?studyDate1)) AS ?year1)
  BIND(MONTH(xsd:date(?studyDate1)) AS ?month1)
  BIND(YEAR(xsd:date(?studyDate2)) AS ?year2)
  BIND(MONTH(xsd:date(?studyDate2)) AS ?month2)
  FILTER(
    (?year1 = ?year2 && ABS(?month1 - ?month2) = 1) ||
    (?year2 = ?year1 + 1 && ?month1 = 12 && ?month2 = 1)
  )
}

question: Find all CT studies of the chest performed on patients with lung cancer history.
sparql:

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?patientName (COUNT(?study) AS ?studyCount)
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName ?patientName .
  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate .
  FILTER(YEAR(xsd:date(?studyDate)) = 2023)
}
GROUP BY ?patientName
ORDER BY DESC(?studyCount)
LIMIT 10

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: List all PET scans for patients undergoing cancer treatment.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?studyInstanceUID ?studyDescription ?studyTime ?studyEndTime ?duration
WHERE {
  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:StudyTime ?studyTime .
  ?study dcm:StudyEndTime ?studyEndTime .
  ?study dcm:StudyInstanceUID ?studyInstanceUID .
  OPTIONAL { ?study dcm:StudyDescription ?studyDescription . }
  BIND(xsd:integer(SUBSTR(?studyEndTime, 1, 2)) - xsd:integer(SUBSTR(?studyTime, 1, 2)) AS ?hourDiff)
  BIND(xsd:integer(SUBSTR(?studyEndTime, 3, 2)) - xsd:integer(SUBSTR(?studyTime, 3, 2)) AS ?minuteDiff)
  BIND(xsd:integer(SUBSTR(?studyEndTime, 5, 2)) - xsd:integer(SUBSTR(?studyTime, 5, 2)) AS ?secondDiff)
  BIND(?hourDiff * 3600 + ?minuteDiff * 60 + ?secondDiff AS ?duration)
}
ORDER BY DESC(?duration)
LIMIT 10

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Show me all angiography series for patients with vascular disease.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?patientName ?studyDate1 ?studyDate2 ?daysBetween
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName ?patientName .
  ?study1 rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study1 dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study1 dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate1 .
  ?study2 rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study2 dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study2 dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate2 .
  FILTER(?study1 != ?study2 && ?studyDate1 < ?studyDate2)
  FILTER NOT EXISTS {
    ?study3 rdf:type dcm:Study .
    ?study3 dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
    ?study3 dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate3 .
    FILTER(?studyDate1 < ?studyDate3 && ?studyDate3 < ?studyDate2)
  }
  BIND(xsd:date(?studyDate2) - xsd:date(?studyDate1) AS ?daysBetween)
}
ORDER BY ?daysBetween
LIMIT 10

sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?seriesInstanceUID ?imageIndex ?windowWidth ?windowCenter ?ratio
WHERE {
  ?series rdf:type dcm:Series .
  ?series dcm:SeriesInstanceUID ?seriesInstanceUID .
  ?series dcm:containsImage ?image .
  ?image dcm:WindowWidth ?windowWidth .
  ?image dcm:WindowCenter ?windowCenter .
  OPTIONAL { ?image dcm:ImageIndex ?imageIndex . }
  BIND(xsd:float(?windowWidth) / xsd:float(?windowCenter) AS ?ratio)
  FILTER(?windowCenter != 0)
}
ORDER BY DESC(?ratio)
LIMIT 10

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: List all bone density studies for female patients over 50 years old.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?patientName (COUNT(DISTINCT ?performingPhysician) AS ?physicianCount)
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName ?patientName .
  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study dcm:PerformingPhysiciansName ?performingPhysician .
}
GROUP BY ?patientName
ORDER BY DESC(?physicianCount)
LIMIT 10

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Show me all MRI knee series for patients with sports injuries.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?studyInstanceUID ?studyDescription (COUNT(DISTINCT ?seriesDescription) AS ?uniqueDescriptions)
WHERE {
  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:StudyInstanceUID ?studyInstanceUID .
  OPTIONAL { ?study dcm:StudyDescription ?studyDescription . }
  ?series rdf:type dcm:Series .
  ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study .
  ?series dcm:SeriesDescription ?seriesDescription .
}
GROUP BY ?studyInstanceUID ?studyDescription
ORDER BY DESC(?uniqueDescriptions)
LIMIT 10

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find all chest X-ray studies for patients with respiratory symptoms.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?patientName (COUNT(?study) AS ?followUpStudyCount)
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName ?patientName .
  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study dcm:StudyDescription ?studyDescription .
  FILTER(REGEX(?studyDescription, "follow-up", "i"))
}
GROUP BY ?patientName
ORDER BY DESC(?followUpStudyCount)
LIMIT 10

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: List all ultrasound series of the gallbladder for patients with abdominal pain.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?seriesInstanceUID ?imageIndex ?rescaleSlope ?rescaleIntercept ?extremeValue
WHERE {
  ?series rdf:type dcm:Series .
  ?series dcm:SeriesInstanceUID ?seriesInstanceUID .
  ?series dcm:containsImage ?image .
  ?image dcm:RescaleSlope ?rescaleSlope .
  ?image dcm:RescaleIntercept ?rescaleIntercept .
  OPTIONAL { ?image dcm:ImageIndex ?imageIndex . }
  BIND(ABS(xsd:float(?rescaleSlope)) + ABS(xsd:float(?rescaleIntercept)) AS ?extremeValue)
}
ORDER BY DESC(?extremeValue)
LIMIT 10

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Retrieve all mammography studies with suspicious findings.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?studyInstanceUID ?studyDescription (COUNT(DISTINCT ?seriesType) AS ?uniqueSeriesTypes) (COUNT(?series) AS ?totalSeries) (COUNT(?series) / COUNT(DISTINCT ?seriesType) AS ?balanceRatio)
WHERE {
  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:StudyInstanceUID ?studyInstanceUID .
  OPTIONAL { ?study dcm:StudyDescription ?studyDescription . }
  ?series rdf:type dcm:Series .
  ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study .
  ?series dcm:SeriesType ?seriesType .
}
GROUP BY ?studyInstanceUID ?studyDescription
HAVING (COUNT(?series) >= 5 && COUNT(DISTINCT ?seriesType) >= 2)
ORDER BY ?balanceRatio
LIMIT 10

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find all CT brain images for patients admitted through the emergency department.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?seriesInstanceUID ?seriesDescription ?largestPixelValue ?smallestPixelValue ?ratio
WHERE {
  ?series rdf:type dcm:Series .
  ?series dcm:LargestPixelValueInSeries ?largestPixelValue .
  ?series dcm:SmallestPixelValueInSeries ?smallestPixelValue .
  ?series dcm:SeriesInstanceUID ?seriesInstanceUID .
  OPTIONAL { ?series dcm:SeriesDescription ?seriesDescription . }
  FILTER(xsd:integer(?smallestPixelValue) != 0)
  BIND(xsd:float(?largestPixelValue) / xsd:float(?smallestPixelValue) AS ?ratio)
}
ORDER BY DESC(?ratio)
LIMIT 10

SELECT ?patientName ?referringPhysician (COUNT(?study) AS ?studyCount)
WHERE {

  ?patient dcm:PatientName ?patientName .
  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study dcm:ReferringPhysicianName ?referringPhysician .
}
GROUP BY ?patientName ?referringPhysician
ORDER BY DESC(?studyCount)
LIMIT 10

sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?equipmentID ?manufacturer ?manufacturerModelName WHERE { ?equipment rdf:type dcm:EquipmentOfBreastTomosynthesisImage . ?equipment dcm:DeviceID ?equipmentID . sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?equipmentID ?manufacturer ?anatomicRegion ?acquisitionContrast WHERE { ?equipment rdf:type dcm:EquipmentOfBreastTomosynthesisImage . ?equipment dcm:DeviceID ?equipmentID . ?equipment dcm:Manufacturer ?manufacturer . ?equipment dcm:isEquipmentOf ?image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionContrast "MIXED" . ?image dcm:isImageOf ?series . ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study . ?study dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?anatomicRegionSeq . ?anatomicRegionSeq dcm:CodeMeaning ?anatomicRegion . FILTER(REGEX(?anatomicRegion, "breast", "i")) }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Retrieve all images with AcquisitionNumber greater than 10 and AcquisitionIndex between 1 and 10 for studies with AccessionNumber starting with "ACC".
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?imageUID ?acquisitionNumber ?acquisitionIndex ?accessionNumber WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:SOPInstanceUID ?imageUID . ?image dcm:AcquisitionNumber ?acquisitionNumber . ?image dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?acquisitionIndex . ?image dcm:isImageOf ?series . ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study . ?study dcm:AccessionNumber ?accessionNumber . instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Calculate the standard deviation of AcquisitionDuration for each AcquisitionProtocolName.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?imageUID ?acquisitionDuration WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:SOPInstanceUID ?imageUID . ?image dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acquisitionDuration . { SELECT (AVG(xsd:decimal(?avgAcquisitionDuration)) AS ?avgDuration) (SQRT(SUM(POW(xsd:decimal(?avgAcquisitionDuration) - ?innerAvgDuration, 2)) / COUNT(?img)) AS ?stdDevDuration) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?avgAcquisitionDuration . { SELECT (AVG(xsd:decimal(?innerAvgAcquisitionDuration)) AS ?innerAvgDuration) WHERE { ?innerImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?innerImg dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?innerAvgAcquisitionDuration . } } } } FILTER(ABS(xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration) - ?avgDuration) > 2 * ?stdDevDuration) } ORDER BY DESC(xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration))

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: List studies with AcquisitionContextSequence values that appear less than 5 times.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?acquisitionIndex ?acquisitionDuration ((?prevDuration + ?acquisitionDuration + ?nextDuration) / 3 AS ?movingAvgDuration) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?acquisitionIndex . ?image dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acquisitionDuration . OPTIONAL { ?prevImage rdf:type dcm:Image . ?prevImage dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?prevIndex . ?prevImage dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?prevDuration . FILTER(xsd:integer(?prevIndex) = xsd:integer(?acquisitionIndex) - 1) } OPTIONAL { ?nextImage rdf:type dcm:Image . ?nextImage dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?nextIndex . ?nextImage dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?nextDuration . FILTER(xsd:integer(?nextIndex) = xsd:integer(?acquisitionIndex) + 1) } FILTER(BOUND(?prevDuration) && BOUND(?nextDuration)) } ORDER BY xsd:integer(?acquisitionIndex)

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the correlation between patient age and number of OphthalmicPatientClinicalInformation entries.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?studyInstanceUID ?acquisitionDateTime (1 + COUNT(?otherStudy) AS ?rank) WHERE { ?study rdf:type dcm:Study . ?study dcm:StudyInstanceUID ?studyInstanceUID . ?study dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?acquisitionDateTime . OPTIONAL { ?otherStudy rdf:type dcm:Study . ?otherStudy dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?otherDateTime . FILTER(xsd:dateTime(?otherDateTime) > xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime)) } } GROUP BY ?studyInstanceUID ?acquisitionDateTime ORDER BY ?rank

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query

BIND(FLOOR(xsd:integer(?acquisitionIndex) / 10) * 10 AS ?bin) } GROUP BY ?bin ORDER BY ?bin

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: List the distribution of AccessionNumber prefixes.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ( SUM((?duration - ?avgDuration) * (?rate - ?avgRate)) / (SQRT(SUM(POW(?duration - ?avgDuration, 2))) * SQRT(SUM(POW(?rate - ?avgRate, 2)))) AS ?correlationCoefficient ) WHERE { { SELECT ?image (xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration) AS ?duration) (xsd:decimal(?lineRate) AS ?rate) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acquisitionDuration . ?image dcm:ALineRate ?lineRate . } } { SELECT (AVG(?duration) AS ?avgDuration) (AVG(?rate) AS ?avgRate) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acqDuration . ?img dcm:ALineRate ?lineRate . BIND(xsd:decimal(?acqDuration) AS ?duration) BIND(xsd:decimal(?lineRate) AS ?rate) } } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the average time between consecutive studies for each patient.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?imageUID ?acquisitionDuration ((?durationValue - ?avgDuration) / ?stdDevDuration AS ?zScore) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:SOPInstanceUID ?imageUID . ?image dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acquisitionDuration . BIND(xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration) AS ?durationValue) { SELECT (AVG(?duration) AS ?avgDuration) (SQRT(SUM(POW(?duration - ?innerAvgDuration, 2)) / COUNT(?img)) AS ?stdDevDuration) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acqDuration . BIND(xsd:decimal(?acqDuration) AS ?duration) { SELECT (AVG(xsd:decimal(?innerAcqDuration)) AS ?innerAvgDuration) WHERE { ?innerImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?innerImg dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?innerAcqDuration . } } } } } ORDER BY ?zScore

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Calculate the ratio of studies with AlgorithmNameCodeSequence to total studies.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT (MAX(?q1Index) AS ?firstQuartile) (MAX(?q2Index) AS ?median) (MAX(?q3Index) AS ?thirdQuartile) WHERE { { SELECT ?acquisitionIndex WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?acquisitionIndex . } ORDER BY xsd:integer(?acquisitionIndex) } { SELECT (COUNT(?img) AS ?count) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?idx . } } BIND(IF(?count * 0.25 <= ?rownum && ?rownum <= ?count * 0.25 + 1, ?acquisitionIndex, 0) AS ?q1Index) BIND(IF(?count * 0.5 <= ?rownum && ?rownum <= ?count * 0.5 + 1, ?acquisitionIndex, 0) AS ?q2Index) BIND(IF(?count * 0.75 <= ?rownum && ?rownum <= ?count * 0.75 + 1, ?acquisitionIndex, 0) AS ?q3Index) BIND(1 + COUNT(?prevImage) AS ?rownum) OPTIONAL { ?prevImage rdf:type dcm:Image . ?prevImage dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?prevIndex . FILTER(xsd:integer(?prevIndex) < xsd:integer(?acquisitionIndex)) } } GROUP BY ?count

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: List the most common AccessoryCode values by manufacturer.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?imageUID ?acquisitionIndex ?acquisitionDuration (?alpha * ?durationValue + (1 - ?alpha) * COALESCE(?prevEMA, ?durationValue) AS ?ema) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:SOPInstanceUID ?imageUID . ?image dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?acquisitionIndex . ?image dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acquisitionDuration . BIND(0.2 AS ?alpha)  # Smoothing factor BIND(xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration) AS ?durationValue) OPTIONAL { ?prevImage rdf:type dcm:Image . ?prevImage dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?prevIndex . ?prevImage dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?prevDuration . BIND(xsd:decimal(?prevDuration) AS ?prevDurationValue) BIND(?alpha * ?prevDurationValue + (1 - ?alpha) * COALESCE(?prevPrevEMA, ?prevDurationValue) AS ?prevEMA) OPTIONAL { ?prevPrevImage rdf:type dcm:Image . ?prevPrevImage dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?prevPrevIndex . ?prevPrevImage dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?prevPrevDuration . BIND(xsd:decimal(?prevPrevDuration) AS ?prevPrevDurationValue) BIND(?alpha * ?prevPrevDurationValue + (1 - ?alpha) * ?prevPrevDurationValue AS ?prevPrevEMA) FILTER(xsd:integer(?prevPrevIndex) = xsd:integer(?prevIndex) - 1) } FILTER(xsd:integer(?prevIndex) = xsd:integer(?acquisitionIndex) - 1) } } ORDER BY xsd:integer(?acquisitionIndex)

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Calculate the percentage of DeformableSpatialRegistration with high accuracy.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT (?thirdQuartile - ?firstQuartile AS ?iqr) WHERE { { SELECT (MAX(?q1Duration) AS ?firstQuartile) (MAX(?q3Duration) AS ?thirdQuartile) WHERE { { SELECT ?acquisitionDuration WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acquisitionDuration . } ORDER BY xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration) } { SELECT (COUNT(?img) AS ?count) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?dur . } } BIND(IF(?count * 0.25 <= ?rownum && ?rownum <= ?count * 0.25 + 1, xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration), 0) AS ?q1Duration) BIND(IF(?count * 0.75 <= ?rownum && ?rownum <= ?count * 0.75 + 1, xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration), 0) AS ?q3Duration) BIND(1 + COUNT(?prevImage) AS ?rownum) OPTIONAL { ?prevImage rdf:type dcm:Image . ?prevImage dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?prevDuration . FILTER(xsd:decimal(?prevDuration) < xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration)) } } GROUP BY ?count } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: List the distribution of AcquisitionDeviceTypeCodeSequence by year.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?studyInstanceUID ?acquisitionDateTime WHERE { ?study rdf:type dcm:Study . ?study dcm:StudyInstanceUID ?studyInstanceUID . ?study dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?acquisitionDateTime . { SELECT (MAX(xsd:dateTime(?maxAcquisitionDateTime)) AS ?maxDateTime) (MAX(xsd:dateTime(?maxAcquisitionDateTime)) - (?range * 0.1) AS ?thresholdDateTime) WHERE { ?s rdf:type dcm:Study . ?s dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?maxAcquisitionDateTime . { SELECT (MAX(xsd:dateTime(?max)) - MIN(xsd:dateTime(?min)) AS ?range) WHERE { ?study1 rdf:type dcm:Study . ?study1 dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?max . ?study2 rdf:type dcm:Study . ?study2 dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?min . } } } } FILTER(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime) > ?thresholdDateTime) } ORDER BY DESC(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime))

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the average number of AnatomicRegionSequence entries per study.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT (?stdDev / ?mean AS ?coefficientOfVariation) WHERE { { SELECT (AVG(xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration)) AS ?mean) (SQRT(SUM(POW(xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration) - ?avgDuration, 2)) / COUNT(?image)) AS ?stdDev) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acquisitionDuration . { SELECT (AVG(xsd:decimal(?avgAcquisitionDuration)) AS ?avgDuration) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?avgAcquisitionDuration . } } } } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Calculate the standard deviation of AbsoluteChannelDisplayScale values.

BIND(xsd:integer(?acquisitionIndex) AS ?index) { SELECT (AVG(?idx) AS ?mean) (SQRT(SUM(POW(?idx - ?avgIdx, 2)) / COUNT(?img)) AS ?stdDev) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?acqIdx . BIND(xsd:integer(?acqIdx) AS ?idx) { SELECT (AVG(xsd:integer(?avgAcqIdx)) AS ?avgIdx) WHERE { ?innerImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?innerImg dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?avgAcqIdx . } } } } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: List the most common combinations of AcquisitionMethodCodeSequence and AcquisitionContextSequence.

BIND(xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration) AS ?duration) { SELECT (AVG(?dur) AS ?mean) (SQRT(SUM(POW(?dur - ?avgDur, 2)) / COUNT(?img)) AS ?stdDev) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acqDur . BIND(xsd:decimal(?acqDur) AS ?dur) { SELECT (AVG(xsd:decimal(?avgAcqDur)) AS ?avgDur) WHERE { ?innerImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?innerImg dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?avgAcqDur . } } } } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the correlation between AcquisitionDuration and patient age.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ( SUM(?yi * (?n - ?i + 0.5)) / (SUM(?yi) * ?n / 2) - 1 AS ?giniCoefficient ) WHERE { { SELECT ?patient (COUNT(?study) AS ?studyCount) WHERE { ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient . ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient . } GROUP BY ?patient ORDER BY ?studyCount } BIND(?studyCount AS ?yi) BIND(1 + COUNT(?otherPatient) AS ?i) { SELECT (COUNT(?p) AS ?n) WHERE { ?p rdf:type dcm:Patient . } } OPTIONAL { ?otherPatient rdf:type dcm:Patient . { SELECT ?otherPatient (COUNT(?otherStudy) AS ?otherStudyCount) WHERE { ?otherStudy dcm:isStudyOf ?otherPatient . } GROUP BY ?otherPatient } FILTER(?otherStudyCount < ?studyCount || (?otherStudyCount = ?studyCount && STR(?otherPatient) < STR(?patient))) } } GROUP BY ?n

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Calculate the percentage of studies with AdministrationRouteCodeSequence "INTRAVENOUS".
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ( -SUM(?probability * LOG(?probability) / LOG(2)) AS ?entropy ) WHERE { { SELECT ?acquisitionContrast (COUNT(?image) AS ?count) (COUNT(?image) / ?totalCount AS ?probability) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?acquisitionContrast . { SELECT (COUNT(?img) AS ?totalCount) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?contrast . } } } GROUP BY ?acquisitionContrast ?totalCount } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: List the distribution of AlgorithmFamilyCodeSequence by department.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ( ?intersectionCount / ?unionCount AS ?jaccardSimilarity ) WHERE { { SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?region) AS ?regions2022) WHERE { ?study rdf:type dcm:Study . ?study dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?acquisitionDateTime . ?study dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?regionSequence . ?regionSequence dcm:CodeMeaning ?region . FILTER(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime)) = 2022) } } { SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?region) AS ?regions2023) WHERE { ?study rdf:type dcm:Study . ?study dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?acquisitionDateTime . ?study dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?regionSequence . ?regionSequence dcm:CodeMeaning ?region . FILTER(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime)) = 2023) } } { SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?region) AS ?intersectionCount) WHERE { ?study1 rdf:type dcm:Study . ?study1 dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?acquisitionDateTime1 . ?study1 dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?regionSequence1 . ?regionSequence1 dcm:CodeMeaning ?region . FILTER(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime1)) = 2022) ?study2 rdf:type dcm:Study . ?study2 dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?acquisitionDateTime2 . ?study2 dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?regionSequence2 . ?regionSequence2 dcm:CodeMeaning ?region . FILTER(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime2)) = 2023) } } BIND(?regions2022 + ?regions2023 - ?intersectionCount AS ?unionCount) }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the average number of OtherPatientIDsSequenceItem per patient.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ( SUM((?index - ?avgIndex) * (?duration - ?avgDuration)) / (SQRT(SUM(POW(?index - ?avgIndex, 2))) * SQRT(SUM(POW(?duration - ?avgDuration, 2)))) AS ?pearsonCorrelation ) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?acquisitionIndex . ?image dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acquisitionDuration . BIND(xsd:integer(?acquisitionIndex) AS ?index) BIND(xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration) AS ?duration) { SELECT (AVG(xsd:integer(?idx)) AS ?avgIndex) (AVG(xsd:decimal(?dur)) AS ?avgDuration) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?idx . ?img dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?dur . } } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Calculate the ratio of BreastProjectionX-RayImage to BreastTomosynthesisImage.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT (?jointCount / ?headCount AS ?conditionalProbability) WHERE { { SELECT (COUNT(?headImage) AS ?headCount) WHERE { ?headImage rdf:type dcm:Image . ?headImage dcm:isImageOf ?series . ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study . ?study dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?regionSequence . ?regionSequence dcm:CodeMeaning ?region . FILTER(REGEX(?region, "HEAD", "i")) } } { SELECT (COUNT(?jointImage) AS ?jointCount) WHERE { ?jointImage rdf:type dcm:Image . ?jointImage dcm:AcquisitionContrast "T1" . ?jointImage dcm:isImageOf ?series . ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study . ?study dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?regionSequence . ?regionSequence dcm:CodeMeaning ?region . FILTER(REGEX(?region, "HEAD", "i")) } } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: List the most common AcquisitionProtocolName values for each AnatomicRegionSequence.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ( SUM(?jointProb * LOG(?jointProb / (?contrastProb * ?regionProb)) / LOG(2)) AS ?mutualInformation ) WHERE { { SELECT ?contrast ?region (COUNT(?image) / ?totalCount AS ?jointProb) (?contrastCount / ?totalCount AS ?contrastProb) (?regionCount / ?totalCount AS ?regionProb) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?contrast . ?image dcm:isImageOf ?series . ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study . ?study dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?regionSequence . ?regionSequence dcm:CodeMeaning ?region . { SELECT (COUNT(?img) AS ?totalCount) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?c . ?img dcm:isImageOf ?s . ?s dcm:isSeriesOf ?st . ?st dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?rs . ?rs dcm:CodeMeaning ?r . } } { SELECT ?contrast (COUNT(?contrastImg) AS ?contrastCount) WHERE { ?contrastImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?contrastImg dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?contrast . } GROUP BY ?contrast } { SELECT ?region (COUNT(?regionImg) AS ?regionCount) WHERE { ?regionImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?regionImg dcm:isImageOf ?regionSeries . ?regionSeries dcm:isSeriesOf ?regionStudy . ?regionStudy dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?regionSeq . ?regionSeq dcm:CodeMeaning ?region . } GROUP BY ?region } } GROUP BY ?contrast ?region ?totalCount ?contrastCount ?regionCount } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the correlation between AcquisitionIndex and image quality metrics.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ( SUM(POW(?observed - ?expected, 2) / ?expected) AS ?chiSquare ) WHERE { { SELECT ?contrast ?region (COUNT(?image) AS ?observed) ((?contrastCount * ?regionCount) / ?totalCount AS ?expected) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?contrast . ?image dcm:isImageOf ?series . ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study . ?study dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?regionSequence . ?regionSequence dcm:CodeMeaning ?region . { SELECT (COUNT(?img) AS ?totalCount) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?c . ?img dcm:isImageOf ?s . ?s dcm:isSeriesOf ?st . ?st dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?rs . ?rs dcm:CodeMeaning ?r . } } { SELECT ?contrast (COUNT(?contrastImg) AS ?contrastCount) WHERE { ?contrastImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?contrastImg dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?contrast . } GROUP BY ?contrast } { SELECT ?region (COUNT(?regionImg) AS ?regionCount) WHERE { ?regionImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?regionImg dcm:isImageOf ?regionSeries . ?regionSeries dcm:isSeriesOf ?regionStudy . ?regionStudy dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?regionSeq . ?regionSeq dcm:CodeMeaning ?region . } GROUP BY ?region } } GROUP BY ?contrast ?region ?totalCount ?contrastCount ?regionCount } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Calculate the percentage of EnhancedPETImage with SUV measurements.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ( 1 - (6 * SUM(POW(?indexRank - ?durationRank, 2)) / (?n * (?n * ?n - 1))) AS ?spearmanCorrelation ) WHERE { { SELECT ?image (1 + COUNT(?otherImageIndex) AS ?indexRank) (1 + COUNT(?otherImageDuration) AS ?durationRank) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?acquisitionIndex . ?image dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acquisitionDuration . OPTIONAL { ?otherImageIndex rdf:type dcm:Image . ?otherImageIndex dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?otherIndex . FILTER(xsd:integer(?otherIndex) < xsd:integer(?acquisitionIndex) || (xsd:integer(?otherIndex) = xsd:integer(?acquisitionIndex) && STR(?otherImageIndex) < STR(?image))) } OPTIONAL { ?otherImageDuration rdf:type dcm:Image . ?otherImageDuration dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?otherDuration . FILTER(xsd:decimal(?otherDuration) < xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration) || (xsd:decimal(?otherDuration) = xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration) && STR(?otherImageDuration) < STR(?image))) } } GROUP BY ?image } { SELECT (COUNT(?img) AS ?n) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?idx . ?img dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?dur . } } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: List the distribution of AcquisitionContrast values by year.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ( (?concordant - ?discordant) / (0.5 * ?n * (?n - 1)) AS ?kendallTau ) WHERE { { SELECT (COUNT(?pair) AS ?concordant) WHERE { ?image1 rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image1 dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?index1 . ?image1 dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?duration1 . ?image2 rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image2 dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?index2 . ?image2 dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?duration2 . FILTER(?image1 != ?image2) FILTER((xsd:integer(?index1) - xsd:integer(?index2)) * (xsd:decimal(?duration1) - xsd:decimal(?duration2)) > 0) BIND(CONCAT(STR(?image1), "-", STR(?image2)) AS ?pair) } } { SELECT (COUNT(?pair) AS ?discordant) WHERE { ?image1 rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image1 dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?index1 . ?image1 dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?duration1 . ?image2 rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image2 dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?index2 . ?image2 dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?duration2 . FILTER(?image1 != ?image2) FILTER((xsd:integer(?index1) - xsd:integer(?index2)) * (xsd:decimal(?duration1) - xsd:decimal(?duration2)) < 0) BIND(CONCAT(STR(?image1), "-", STR(?image2)) AS ?pair) } } { SELECT (COUNT(?img) AS ?n) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?idx . ?img dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?dur . } } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the average number of ContourImageSequenceItem per radiation therapy plan.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ( ?entropyContrast - ?conditionalEntropy AS ?informationGain ) WHERE { { SELECT ( -SUM(?contrastProb * LOG(?contrastProb) / LOG(2)) AS ?entropyContrast ) WHERE { { SELECT ?contrast (COUNT(?contrastImg) / ?totalCount AS ?contrastProb) WHERE { ?contrastImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?contrastImg dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?contrast . { SELECT (COUNT(?img) AS ?totalCount) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?c . } } } GROUP BY ?contrast ?totalCount } } } { SELECT ( SUM(?regionProb * ?regionEntropyContrast) AS ?conditionalEntropy ) WHERE { { SELECT ?region (COUNT(?regionImg) / ?totalCount AS ?regionProb) (-SUM(?contrastGivenRegionProb * LOG(?contrastGivenRegionProb) / LOG(2)) AS ?regionEntropyContrast) WHERE { ?regionImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?regionImg dcm:isImageOf ?regionSeries . ?regionSeries dcm:isSeriesOf ?regionStudy . ?regionStudy dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?regionSeq . ?regionSeq dcm:CodeMeaning ?region . { SELECT (COUNT(?img) AS ?totalCount) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?c . } } { SELECT ?region ?contrast (COUNT(?contrastRegionImg) / ?regionCount AS ?contrastGivenRegionProb) WHERE { ?contrastRegionImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?contrastRegionImg dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?contrast . ?contrastRegionImg dcm:isImageOf ?contrastRegionSeries . ?contrastRegionSeries dcm:isSeriesOf ?contrastRegionStudy . ?contrastRegionStudy dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?contrastRegionSeq . ?contrastRegionSeq dcm:CodeMeaning ?region . { SELECT ?region (COUNT(?rImg) AS ?regionCount) WHERE { ?rImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?rImg dcm:isImageOf ?rSeries . ?rSeries dcm:isSeriesOf ?rStudy . ?rStudy dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?rSeq . ?rSeq dcm:CodeMeaning ?region . } GROUP BY ?region } } GROUP BY ?region ?contrast ?regionCount } } GROUP BY ?region ?totalCount } } } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query

BIND(?contrastValue AS ?contrast) { SELECT (COUNT(?img) AS ?totalCount) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?c . } } { SELECT ?contrastValue ?region (COUNT(?regionContrastValueImg) / ?contrastValueCount AS ?regionGivenContrastValueProb) WHERE { ?regionContrastValueImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?regionContrastValueImg dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?contrastValue . ?regionContrastValueImg dcm:isImageOf ?regionContrastValueSeries . ?regionContrastValueSeries dcm:isSeriesOf ?regionContrastValueStudy . ?regionContrastValueStudy dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?regionContrastValueSeq . ?regionContrastValueSeq dcm:CodeMeaning ?region . { SELECT ?contrastValue (COUNT(?cvImg) AS ?contrastValueCount) WHERE { ?cvImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?cvImg dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?contrastValue . } GROUP BY ?contrastValue } } GROUP BY ?contrastValue ?region ?contrastValueCount } } GROUP BY ?contrast ?contrastValue ?totalCount } } GROUP BY ?contrast } } ORDER BY DESC(?informationGain) LIMIT 1

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: List the most common combinations of AcquisitionDeviceTypeCodeSequence and AlgorithmFamilyCodeSequence.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?k ( ?logLikelihood + ?k * LOG(?n) AS ?bic ) WHERE { { SELECT ?k ( -0.5 * ?n * LOG(SUM(POW(?studyCount - ?centroid, 2)) / ?n) AS ?logLikelihood ) WHERE { { SELECT ?patient ?studyCount ( FLOOR(?studyCount / 5) * 5 + 2.5 AS ?centroid ) WHERE { ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient . { SELECT ?patient (COUNT(?study) AS ?studyCount) WHERE { ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient . } GROUP BY ?patient } BIND(FLOOR(?studyCount / 5) AS ?cluster) BIND(FLOOR(?studyCount / 5) + 1 AS ?k) } } { SELECT (COUNT(?p) AS ?n) WHERE { ?p rdf:type dcm:Patient . } } } GROUP BY ?k ?n } } ORDER BY ?bic LIMIT 1

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the correlation between AcquisitionMatrix and image resolution.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ( AVG((?b - ?a) / IF(?a > ?b, ?a, ?b)) AS ?silhouetteCoefficient ) WHERE { { SELECT ?image ?cluster ( AVG(ABS(?duration - ?otherDuration)) AS ?a ) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acquisitionDuration . BIND(xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration) AS ?duration) BIND(FLOOR(?duration / 30) AS ?cluster) ?otherImage rdf:type dcm:Image . ?otherImage dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?otherAcquisitionDuration . BIND(xsd:decimal(?otherAcquisitionDuration) AS ?otherDuration) BIND(FLOOR(?otherDuration / 30) AS ?otherCluster) FILTER(?cluster = ?otherCluster) FILTER(?image != ?otherImage) } GROUP BY ?image ?cluster ?duration } { SELECT ?image ( MIN(?avgDistanceToOtherCluster) AS ?b ) WHERE { { SELECT ?image ?otherCluster ( AVG(ABS(?duration - ?otherDuration)) AS ?avgDistanceToOtherCluster ) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acquisitionDuration . BIND(xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration) AS ?duration) BIND(FLOOR(?duration / 30) AS ?cluster) ?otherImage rdf:type dcm:Image . ?otherImage dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?otherAcquisitionDuration . BIND(xsd:decimal(?otherAcquisitionDuration) AS ?otherDuration) BIND(FLOOR(?otherDuration / 30) AS ?otherCluster) FILTER(?cluster != ?otherCluster) } GROUP BY ?image ?otherCluster ?duration } } GROUP BY ?image } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Calculate the percentage of OphthalmicPatientClinicalInformation with abnormal findings.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ( AVG(?maxRatio) AS ?daviesBouldinIndex ) WHERE { { SELECT ?cluster ( MAX((?clusterDispersion + ?otherClusterDispersion) / ?interClusterDistance) AS ?maxRatio ) WHERE { { SELECT ?cluster ( AVG(ABS(?dateTime - ?clusterCentroid)) AS ?clusterDispersion ) WHERE { ?study rdf:type dcm:Study . ?study dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?acquisitionDateTime . BIND(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime)) AS ?year) BIND(MONTH(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime)) AS ?month) BIND(?year * 12 + ?month AS ?dateTime) BIND(FLOOR(?dateTime / 6) AS ?cluster) { SELECT ?cluster (AVG(?dt) AS ?clusterCentroid) WHERE { ?s rdf:type dcm:Study . ?s dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?adt . BIND(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?adt)) AS ?y) BIND(MONTH(xsd:dateTime(?adt)) AS ?m) BIND(?y * 12 + ?m AS ?dt) BIND(FLOOR(?dt / 6) AS ?cluster) } GROUP BY ?cluster } } GROUP BY ?cluster } { SELECT ?cluster ?otherCluster ?clusterDispersion ?otherClusterDispersion (ABS(?clusterCentroid - ?otherClusterCentroid) AS ?interClusterDistance) WHERE { { SELECT ?cluster ( AVG(ABS(?dateTime - ?clusterCentroid)) AS ?clusterDispersion ) WHERE { ?study rdf:type dcm:Study . ?study dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?acquisitionDateTime . BIND(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime)) AS ?year) BIND(MONTH(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime)) AS ?month) BIND(?year * 12 + ?month AS ?dateTime) BIND(FLOOR(?dateTime / 6) AS ?cluster) { SELECT ?cluster (AVG(?dt) AS ?clusterCentroid) WHERE { ?s rdf:type dcm:Study . ?s dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?adt . BIND(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?adt)) AS ?y) BIND(MONTH(xsd:dateTime(?adt)) AS ?m) BIND(?y * 12 + ?m AS ?dt) BIND(FLOOR(?dt / 6) AS ?cluster) } GROUP BY ?cluster } } GROUP BY ?cluster ?clusterCentroid } { SELECT ?otherCluster ( AVG(ABS(?dateTime - ?otherClusterCentroid)) AS ?otherClusterDispersion ) WHERE { ?study rdf:type dcm:Study . ?study dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?acquisitionDateTime . BIND(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime)) AS ?year) BIND(MONTH(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime)) AS ?month) BIND(?year * 12 + ?month AS ?dateTime) BIND(FLOOR(?dateTime / 6) AS ?otherCluster) { SELECT ?otherCluster (AVG(?dt) AS ?otherClusterCentroid) WHERE { ?s rdf:type dcm:Study . ?s dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?adt . BIND(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?adt)) AS ?y) BIND(MONTH(xsd:dateTime(?adt)) AS ?m) BIND(?y * 12 + ?m AS ?dt) BIND(FLOOR(?dt / 6) AS ?otherCluster) } GROUP BY ?otherCluster } } GROUP BY ?otherCluster ?otherClusterCentroid } FILTER(?cluster != ?otherCluster) } } } GROUP BY ?cluster } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query

sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ( ?minInterClusterDistance / ?maxIntraClusterDistance AS ?dunnIndex ) WHERE { { SELECT (MIN(?interClusterDistance) AS ?minInterClusterDistance) WHERE { { SELECT ?cluster ?otherCluster ( MIN(ABS(?index - ?otherIndex)) AS ?interClusterDistance ) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?acquisitionIndex . BIND(xsd:integer(?acquisitionIndex) AS ?index) BIND(FLOOR(?index / 10) AS ?cluster) ?otherImage rdf:type dcm:Image . ?otherImage dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?otherAcquisitionIndex . BIND(xsd:integer(?otherAcquisitionIndex) AS ?otherIndex) BIND(FLOOR(?otherIndex / 10) AS ?otherCluster) FILTER(?cluster != ?otherCluster) } GROUP BY ?cluster ?otherCluster } } } { SELECT (MAX(?intraClusterDistance) AS ?maxIntraClusterDistance) WHERE { { SELECT ?cluster ( MAX(ABS(?index - ?otherIndex)) AS ?intraClusterDistance ) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?acquisitionIndex . BIND(xsd:integer(?acquisitionIndex) AS ?index) BIND(FLOOR(?index / 10) AS ?cluster) ?otherImage rdf:type dcm:Image . ?otherImage dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?otherAcquisitionIndex . BIND(xsd:integer(?otherAcquisitionIndex) AS ?otherIndex) BIND(FLOOR(?otherIndex / 10) AS ?otherCluster) FILTER(?cluster = ?otherCluster) FILTER(?image != ?otherImage) } GROUP BY ?cluster } } } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the average number of DeliveryVerificationImageSequenceItem per treatment session.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ( (?betweenClusterVariance / (?k - 1)) / (?withinClusterVariance / (?n - ?k)) AS ?calinskiHarabaszIndex ) WHERE { { SELECT ( SUM(?clusterSize * POW(?clusterCentroid - ?globalCentroid, 2)) AS ?betweenClusterVariance ) WHERE { { SELECT ?cluster (COUNT(?study) AS ?clusterSize) (AVG(?dateTime) AS ?clusterCentroid) WHERE { ?study rdf:type dcm:Study . ?study dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?acquisitionDateTime . BIND(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime)) * 12 + MONTH(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime)) AS ?dateTime) BIND(FLOOR(?dateTime / 6) AS ?cluster) } GROUP BY ?cluster } { SELECT (AVG(?dt) AS ?globalCentroid) WHERE { ?s rdf:type dcm:Study . ?s dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?adt . BIND(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?adt)) * 12 + MONTH(xsd:dateTime(?adt)) AS ?dt) } } } } { SELECT ( SUM(?withinClusterVarianceSum) AS ?withinClusterVariance ) WHERE { { SELECT ?cluster ( SUM(POW(?dateTime - ?clusterCentroid, 2)) AS ?withinClusterVarianceSum ) WHERE { ?study rdf:type dcm:Study . ?study dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?acquisitionDateTime . BIND(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime)) * 12 + MONTH(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime)) AS ?dateTime) BIND(FLOOR(?dateTime / 6) AS ?cluster) { SELECT ?cluster (AVG(?dt) AS ?clusterCentroid) WHERE { ?s rdf:type dcm:Study . ?s dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?adt . BIND(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?adt)) * 12 + MONTH(xsd:dateTime(?adt)) AS ?dt) BIND(FLOOR(?dt / 6) AS ?cluster) } GROUP BY ?cluster } } GROUP BY ?cluster } } } { SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?cluster) AS ?k) WHERE { ?study rdf:type dcm:Study . ?study dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?acquisitionDateTime . BIND(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime)) * 12 + MONTH(xsd:dateTime(?acquisitionDateTime)) AS ?dateTime) BIND(FLOOR(?dateTime / 6) AS ?cluster) } } { SELECT (COUNT(?study) AS ?n) WHERE { ?study rdf:type dcm:Study . ?study dcm:AcquisitionDateTime ?acquisitionDateTime . } } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Calculate the standard deviation of AcquisitionDuration for each EnhancedMRImage type.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ?k ( LOG(?expectedDispersion) - LOG(?observedDispersion) AS ?gapStatistic ) WHERE { { SELECT ?k ( SUM(?withinClusterDispersion) AS ?observedDispersion ) WHERE { { SELECT ?k ?cluster ( SUM(POW(?duration - ?clusterCentroid, 2)) / ?clusterSize AS ?withinClusterDispersion ) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acquisitionDuration . BIND(xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration) AS ?duration) BIND(FLOOR(?duration / 30) AS ?cluster) BIND(FLOOR(?duration / 30) + 1 AS ?k) { SELECT ?cluster (COUNT(?img) AS ?clusterSize) (AVG(?dur) AS ?clusterCentroid) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acqDur . BIND(xsd:decimal(?acqDur) AS ?dur) BIND(FLOOR(?dur / 30) AS ?cluster) } GROUP BY ?cluster } } GROUP BY ?k ?cluster ?clusterSize } } GROUP BY ?k } { SELECT ?k ( ?totalVariance / ?k AS ?expectedDispersion ) WHERE { { SELECT ( SUM(POW(?duration - ?globalMean, 2)) / ?n AS ?totalVariance ) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acquisitionDuration . BIND(xsd:decimal(?acquisitionDuration) AS ?duration) { SELECT (AVG(xsd:decimal(?acqDur)) AS ?globalMean) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acqDur . } } { SELECT (COUNT(?img) AS ?n) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acqDur . } } } } BIND(FLOOR(?duration / 30) + 1 AS ?k) } GROUP BY ?k ?totalVariance } } ORDER BY DESC(?gapStatistic) LIMIT 1

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: List the most common combinations of AdmittingDiagnosesCodeSequence and AnatomicRegionSequence.
sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ( ?sumMinDistanceRandom / (?sumMinDistanceRandom + ?sumMinDistanceActual) AS ?hopkinsStatistic ) WHERE { { SELECT (SUM(?minDistanceRandom) AS ?sumMinDistanceRandom) WHERE { { SELECT ?randomPoint ( MIN(ABS(?randomPoint - ?actualIndex)) AS ?minDistanceRandom ) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?acquisitionIndex . BIND(xsd:integer(?acquisitionIndex) AS ?actualIndex) BIND(RAND() * 100 AS ?randomPoint) } GROUP BY ?randomPoint LIMIT 10 } } } { SELECT (SUM(?minDistanceActual) AS ?sumMinDistanceActual) WHERE { { SELECT ?image ( MIN(IF(?image != ?otherImage, ABS(?index - ?otherIndex), 1000000)) AS ?minDistanceActual ) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?acquisitionIndex . BIND(xsd:integer(?acquisitionIndex) AS ?index) ?otherImage rdf:type dcm:Image . ?otherImage dcm:AcquisitionIndex ?otherAcquisitionIndex . BIND(xsd:integer(?otherAcquisitionIndex) AS ?otherIndex) } GROUP BY ?image ?index LIMIT 10 } } } }

BIND(FLOOR(xsd:integer(?acquisitionIndex) / 10) AS ?indexCluster) } GROUP BY ?indexCluster } { SELECT ?durationCluster (COUNT(?image) AS ?nj) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionDuration ?acquisitionDuration . sparql: PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT ( ?mutualInformation / SQRT(?entropyContrast * ?entropyRegion) AS ?normalizedMutualInformation ) WHERE { { SELECT ( SUM(?jointProb * LOG(?jointProb / (?contrastProb * ?regionProb)) / LOG(2)) AS ?mutualInformation ) WHERE { { SELECT ?contrast ?region (COUNT(?image) / ?totalCount AS ?jointProb) (?contrastCount / ?totalCount AS ?contrastProb) (?regionCount / ?totalCount AS ?regionProb) WHERE { ?image rdf:type dcm:Image . ?image dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?contrast . ?image dcm:isImageOf ?series . ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study . ?study dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?regionSequence . ?regionSequence dcm:CodeMeaning ?region . { SELECT (COUNT(?img) AS ?totalCount) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?c . ?img dcm:isImageOf ?s . ?s dcm:isSeriesOf ?st . ?st dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?rs . ?rs dcm:CodeMeaning ?r . } } { SELECT ?contrast (COUNT(?contrastImg) AS ?contrastCount) WHERE { ?contrastImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?contrastImg dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?contrast . } GROUP BY ?contrast } { SELECT ?region (COUNT(?regionImg) AS ?regionCount) WHERE { ?regionImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?regionImg dcm:isImageOf ?regionSeries . ?regionSeries dcm:isSeriesOf ?regionStudy . ?regionStudy dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?regionSeq . ?regionSeq dcm:CodeMeaning ?region . } GROUP BY ?region } } GROUP BY ?contrast ?region ?totalCount ?contrastCount ?regionCount } } } { SELECT ( -SUM(?contrastProb * LOG(?contrastProb) / LOG(2)) AS ?entropyContrast ) WHERE { { SELECT ?contrast (COUNT(?contrastImg) / ?totalCount AS ?contrastProb) WHERE { ?contrastImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?contrastImg dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?contrast . { SELECT (COUNT(?img) AS ?totalCount) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:AcquisitionContrast ?c . } } } GROUP BY ?contrast ?totalCount } } } { SELECT ( -SUM(?regionProb * LOG(?regionProb) / LOG(2)) AS ?entropyRegion ) WHERE { { SELECT ?region (COUNT(?regionImg) / ?totalCount AS ?regionProb) WHERE { ?regionImg rdf:type dcm:Image . ?regionImg dcm:isImageOf ?regionSeries . ?regionSeries dcm:isSeriesOf ?regionStudy . ?regionStudy dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?regionSeq . ?regionSeq dcm:CodeMeaning ?region . { SELECT (COUNT(?img) AS ?totalCount) WHERE { ?img rdf:type dcm:Image . ?img dcm:isImageOf ?s . ?s dcm:isSeriesOf ?st . ?st dcm:AnatomicRegionSequence ?rs . ?rs dcm:CodeMeaning ?r . } } } GROUP BY ?region ?totalCount } } } }

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find all studies for patient John Smith.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?study ?studyDate
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName "John Smith" .
  ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate .
}
ORDER BY ?studyDate

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: List all CT images for patient Sarah Johnson.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?ctimage
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName "Sarah Johnson" .
  ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study .
  ?series dcm:Modality "CT" .
  ?ctimage rdf:type dcm:Image .
  ?ctimage dcm:isImageOf ?series .
}

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query

PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>

  ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
}

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query

PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?ctimage ?kvp
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName "David Anderson" .
  ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study .
  ?series dcm:Modality "CT" .
  ?ctimage rdf:type dcm:Image .
  ?ctimage dcm:isImageOf ?series .
  ?ctimage dcm:KVP ?kvp .
  FILTER(xsd:float(?kvp) > 120)
}
ORDER BY ?kvp

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Count the number of studies performed each day of the week.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?dayOfWeek (COUNT(?study) AS ?studyCount)
WHERE {
  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate .
  BIND(
    IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Monday"), "Monday",
      IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Tuesday"), "Tuesday",
        IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Wednesday"), "Wednesday",
          IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Thursday"), "Thursday",
            IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Friday"), "Friday",
              IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Saturday"), "Saturday", "Sunday")
            )
          )
        )
      )
    ) AS ?dayOfWeek
  )
}
GROUP BY ?dayOfWeek
ORDER BY CASE ?dayOfWeek
  WHEN "Monday" THEN 1
  WHEN "Tuesday" THEN 2
  WHEN "Wednesday" THEN 3
  WHEN "Thursday" THEN 4
  WHEN "Friday" THEN 5
  WHEN "Saturday" THEN 6
  WHEN "Sunday" THEN 7
END

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Count the number of patients by age group.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?ageGroup (COUNT(?patient) AS ?patientCount)
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study dcm:PatientsAge ?patientsAge .
  BIND(
    IF(xsd:integer(REPLACE(?patientsAge, "Y", "")) < 18, "Pediatric",
      IF(xsd:integer(REPLACE(?patientsAge, "Y", "")) < 65, "Adult", "Elderly")
    ) AS ?ageGroup
  )
}
GROUP BY ?ageGroup

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the patients who have had CT studies with KVP values above average.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?patientName
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName ?patientName .
  ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study .
  ?series dcm:Modality "CT" .
  ?ctimage rdf:type dcm:Image .
  ?ctimage dcm:isImageOf ?series .
  ?ctimage dcm:KVP ?kvp .
  {
    SELECT (AVG(xsd:float(?avgKvp)) AS ?overallAvgKVP)
    WHERE {
      ?img rdf:type dcm:Image .
      ?img dcm:isImageOf ?s .
      ?s dcm:Modality "CT" .
      ?img dcm:KVP ?avgKvp .
    }
  }
  FILTER(xsd:float(?kvp) > ?overallAvgKVP)
}

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the distribution of patient ages for CT studies.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?ageGroup (COUNT(DISTINCT ?patient) AS ?patientCount)
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study dcm:PatientsAge ?patientsAge .
  ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study .
  ?series dcm:Modality "CT" .
  BIND(
    IF(xsd:integer(REPLACE(?patientsAge, "Y", "")) < 18, "Pediatric",
      IF(xsd:integer(REPLACE(?patientsAge, "Y", "")) < 65, "Adult", "Elderly")
    ) AS ?ageGroup
  )
}
GROUP BY ?ageGroup

sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?patientName (COUNT(?ctimage) AS ?imageCount)
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName ?patientName .
  ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study .
  ?series dcm:Modality "CT" .
  ?ctimage rdf:type dcm:Image .
  ?ctimage dcm:isImageOf ?series .
}
GROUP BY ?patientName
ORDER BY DESC(?imageCount)
LIMIT 10

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the distribution of CT studies by day of the week.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?dayOfWeek (COUNT(?study) AS ?studyCount)
WHERE {
  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate .
  ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study .
  ?series dcm:Modality "CT" .
  BIND(
    IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Monday"), "Monday",
      IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Tuesday"), "Tuesday",
        IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Wednesday"), "Wednesday",
          IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Thursday"), "Thursday",
            IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Friday"), "Friday",
              IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Saturday"), "Saturday", "Sunday")
            )
          )
        )
      )
    ) AS ?dayOfWeek
  )
}
GROUP BY ?dayOfWeek
ORDER BY CASE ?dayOfWeek
  WHEN "Monday" THEN 1
  WHEN "Tuesday" THEN 2
  WHEN "Wednesday" THEN 3
  WHEN "Thursday" THEN 4
  WHEN "Friday" THEN 5
  WHEN "Saturday" THEN 6
  WHEN "Sunday" THEN 7
END

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the distribution of CT studies by time of day.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?timeOfDay (COUNT(?study) AS ?studyCount)
WHERE {
  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:StudyTime ?studyTime .
  ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study .
  ?series dcm:Modality "CT" .
  BIND(
    IF(xsd:time(?studyTime) < xsd:time("06:00:00"), "Night",
      IF(xsd:time(?studyTime) < xsd:time("12:00:00"), "Morning",
        IF(xsd:time(?studyTime) < xsd:time("18:00:00"), "Afternoon", "Evening")
      )
    ) AS ?timeOfDay
  )
}
GROUP BY ?timeOfDay
ORDER BY CASE ?timeOfDay
  WHEN "Morning" THEN 1
  WHEN "Afternoon" THEN 2
  WHEN "Evening" THEN 3
  WHEN "Night" THEN 4
END

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the average EnergyWeightingFactor for CT images.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT (AVG(xsd:float(?energyWeightingFactor)) AS ?avgEnergyWeightingFactor)
WHERE {
  ?series rdf:type dcm:Series .
  ?series dcm:Modality "CT" .
  ?ctimage rdf:type dcm:Image .
  ?ctimage dcm:isImageOf ?series .
  ?ctimage dcm:EnergyWeightingFactor ?energyWeightingFactor .
}

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the CT images with EnergyWeightingFactor above average.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?ctimage ?energyWeightingFactor
WHERE {
  ?series rdf:type dcm:Series .
  ?series dcm:Modality "CT" .
  ?ctimage rdf:type dcm:Image .
  ?ctimage dcm:isImageOf ?series .
  ?ctimage dcm:EnergyWeightingFactor ?energyWeightingFactor .
  {
    SELECT (AVG(xsd:float(?avgEWF)) AS ?overallAvgEWF)
    WHERE {
      ?img rdf:type dcm:Image .
      ?img dcm:isImageOf ?s .
      ?s dcm:Modality "CT" .
      ?img dcm:EnergyWeightingFactor ?avgEWF .
    }
  }
  FILTER(xsd:float(?energyWeightingFactor) > ?overallAvgEWF)
}
ORDER BY DESC(xsd:float(?energyWeightingFactor))

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the most recent CT study for each patient.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?patientName ?studyDate
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName ?patientName .
  ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate .
  ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study .
  ?series dcm:Modality "CT" .
  {
    SELECT ?patient (MAX(?date) AS ?maxDate)
    WHERE {
      ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
      ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
      ?study dcm:StudyDate ?date .
      ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study .
      ?series dcm:Modality "CT" .
    }
    GROUP BY ?patient
  }
  FILTER(?studyDate = ?maxDate)
}
ORDER BY ?patientName

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the patients who have had CT studies in consecutive months.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?patientName
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName ?patientName .
  ?study1 dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study1 dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate1 .
  ?series1 dcm:isSeriesOf ?study1 .
  ?series1 dcm:Modality "CT" .
  ?study2 dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study2 dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate2 .
  ?series2 dcm:isSeriesOf ?study2 .
  ?series2 dcm:Modality "CT" .
  FILTER(?study1 != ?study2)
  BIND(SUBSTR(?studyDate1, 0, 7) AS ?yearMonth1)
  BIND(SUBSTR(?studyDate2, 0, 7) AS ?yearMonth2)
  FILTER(?yearMonth1 != ?yearMonth2)
  BIND(xsd:integer(SUBSTR(?studyDate1, 0, 4)) AS ?year1)
  BIND(xsd:integer(SUBSTR(?studyDate1, 6, 2)) AS ?month1)
  BIND(xsd:integer(SUBSTR(?studyDate2, 0, 4)) AS ?year2)
  BIND(xsd:integer(SUBSTR(?studyDate2, 6, 2)) AS ?month2)
  FILTER(
    (?year1 = ?year2 && ABS(?month1 - ?month2) = 1) ||
    (?year1 != ?year2 && (
      (?month1 = 12 && ?month2 = 1 && ?year2 = ?year1 + 1) ||
      (?month2 = 12 && ?month1 = 1 && ?year1 = ?year2 + 1)
    ))
  )
}

  ?series2 dcm:isSeriesOf ?study2 .
  ?series2 dcm:Modality "MRI" .
  FILTER(?study1 != ?study2)
}
ORDER BY ?studyDate ?patientName

question: Find all CT images with specific ContentTime in the afternoon.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?ctimage ?contentTime
WHERE {
  ?series rdf:type dcm:Series .
  ?series dcm:Modality "CT" .
  ?ctimage rdf:type dcm:Image .
  ?ctimage dcm:isImageOf ?series .
  ?ctimage dcm:ContentTime ?contentTime .
  FILTER(xsd:time(?contentTime) >= xsd:time("12:00:00") && xsd:time(?contentTime) < xsd:time("18:00:00"))
}
ORDER BY ?contentTime

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Count the number of CT studies performed each month in 2023.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?month (COUNT(DISTINCT ?study) AS ?studyCount)
WHERE {
  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate .
  ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study .
  ?series dcm:Modality "CT" .
  FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "2023"))
  BIND(SUBSTR(?studyDate, 6, 2) AS ?month)
}
GROUP BY ?month
ORDER BY ?month

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the most recent CT study for each patient.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?patientName (MAX(?studyDate) AS ?latestStudyDate)
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName ?patientName .
  ?study dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate .
  ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study .
  ?series dcm:Modality "CT" .
}
GROUP BY ?patientName
ORDER BY DESC(?latestStudyDate)

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Count the number of CT studies performed each day of the week.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?dayOfWeek (COUNT(?study) AS ?studyCount)
WHERE {
  ?study rdf:type dcm:Study .
  ?study dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate .
  ?series dcm:isSeriesOf ?study .
  ?series dcm:Modality "CT" .
  BIND(
    IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Monday"), "Monday",
      IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Tuesday"), "Tuesday",
        IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Wednesday"), "Wednesday",
          IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Thursday"), "Thursday",
            IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Friday"), "Friday",
              IF(CONTAINS(STR(?studyDate), "Saturday"), "Saturday", "Sunday")
            )
          )
        )
      )
    ) AS ?dayOfWeek
  )
}
GROUP BY ?dayOfWeek
ORDER BY CASE ?dayOfWeek
  WHEN "Monday" THEN 1
  WHEN "Tuesday" THEN 2
  WHEN "Wednesday" THEN 3
  WHEN "Thursday" THEN 4
  WHEN "Friday" THEN 5
  WHEN "Saturday" THEN 6
  WHEN "Sunday" THEN 7
END

instruction: Read this Natural Language Query very carefully and convert this into valid SPARQL Query
question: Find the time gap between consecutive CT studies for each patient.
sparql:
PREFIX dcm: <http://semantic-dicom.org/dcm#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?patientName ?studyDate1 ?studyDate2 
       (xsd:integer(xsd:date(?studyDate2)) - xsd:integer(xsd:date(?studyDate1)) AS ?daysBetween)
WHERE {
  ?patient rdf:type dcm:Patient .
  ?patient dcm:PatientName ?patientName .
  ?study1 dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study1 dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate1 .
  ?series1 dcm:isSeriesOf ?study1 .
  ?series1 dcm:Modality "CT" .
  ?study2 dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
  ?study2 dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate2 .
  ?series2 dcm:isSeriesOf ?study2 .
  ?series2 dcm:Modality "CT" .
  FILTER(xsd:date(?studyDate1) < xsd:date(?studyDate2))
  FILTER NOT EXISTS {
    ?study3 dcm:isStudyOf ?patient .
    ?study3 dcm:StudyDate ?studyDate3 .
    ?series3 dcm:isSeriesOf ?study3 .
    ?series3 dcm:Modality "CT" .
    FILTER(xsd:date(?studyDate1) < xsd:date(?studyDate3) && xsd:date(?studyDate3) < xsd:date(?studyDate2))
  }
}
ORDER BY ?patientName ?studyDate1
